code: import{createAction,createRequestTypes,FAILURE,REQUEST,SUCCESS}from'./index';export var COMMENT_THREAD=createRequestTypes('COMMENT_THREAD');export var thread={request:function request(videoId,nextPageToken){return createAction(COMMENT_THREAD[REQUEST],{videoId,nextPageToken});},success:function success(response,videoId){return createAction(COMMENT_THREAD[SUCCESS],{response,videoId});},failure:function failure(response){return createAction(COMMENT_THREAD[FAILURE],{response});}};
